Uses of Package
fast3d.complex.light

  • Packages that use fast3d.complex.light 
    Package Description

  • Classes in fast3d.complex.light used by fast3d.complex 
    Class and Description
    Illuminatable
    a renderable is illuminatable if it has a surface that can be colored considering the universes lighting data
    Light
    some surfaces can offer data to calculate an almost realistic shadow- or light- effects
    Material
    combines all data used to render under light
  • Classes in fast3d.complex.light used by fast3d.complex.light 
    Class and Description
    DirectionalLight
    a directional light just works as sunlight on earth
    Illuminatable
    a renderable is illuminatable if it has a surface that can be colored considering the universes lighting data
    Light
    some surfaces can offer data to calculate an almost realistic shadow- or light- effects
    Material
    combines all data used to render under light
    ObstructableLight
    some forms of light (e.g. directional- or point- light) may cause shadows
